title: Hour 3 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins guest hosting
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Doug Gottlieb & Ryan Hollins guest hosting
description:
Doug and Ryan tell you how the Celtics were able to pull out game seven in Miami Sunday night to advance to the NBA Finals against Golden State.  NBA Reporter and FSR NBA Playoffs Insider Mark Medina joins Doug and Ryan to talk about the Lakers' hiring of Darvin Ham, the NBA Finals matchup and other major headlines around the NBA on this holiday. Plus, Doug and Ryan discuss America's need, the need for speed.  

#douggottliebshow 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
